fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Good-aligned faction
- No factional kill or chat
- All players, regardless of faction, get a single-use revolver that deals a basic attack. You can't use it night one.
- At the start of each day, it's revealed who used a revolver last night.
- At the end of day 5, the Shootout will take place, ending the game. The Frontier will lose the game when the Shootout starts.
- The Frontier immediately loses if they collectively shoot or hang 3 other Frontier members.
- If the game would draw, the Frontier wins.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.
